Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Prohibits persons affiliated with terror organizations from being appointed to permanent, temporary or provisional positions
Summary: Prohibits persons affiliated with terror organizations from being appointed to permanent, temporary or provisional positions in the state civil service system.
LawCode: Add ยง66, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to prohibiting the appointment of persons affiliated with terror organizations
